item.description:
The Worcester Art Museum and Tower Hill Botanic Garden collaborate to host a premier floral design event.

At the Museum, 20 works from the Worcester Art Museum Collection are interpreted in flowers. Public spaces are adorned by area florists.

We can meet 1:30 for a 2:00 tour Sunday, Feb 8th in the Lancaster street lobby -

Worcester Art Museum,155 Salisbury Street, Worcester 01609.

Tour is free with museum admission.

If anyone is interested we could also have an early dinner.

(event suggested by Barbara Diamond)

Barbara has suggested The Boylston or Sole Proprieter for dinner - both have websites
item.name: The Worcester Art Museum and Tower Hill Botanic Garden floral design event
